item.title: Ledger Wallet
item.description: Ledger Nano S About Ledger Wallet Requirements Installation Ledger Particl app Particl Core configuration Usage Sending PART using Ledger Cold staking on Ledger About Ledger Wallet Ledger Nano (S/X) is a hardware wallet which stores user’s private keys in a secure hardware device. Hardware wallets have major advantages over standard software wallets: private keys are stored in a secure chip, and cannot be transferred out of the device.

item.title: Hardware wallets
item.description: Advantages They have major advantages over standard software wallets: private keys are stored in a protected area of a microcontroller, and cannot be transferred out of the device in plaintext. That means your funds are safe even when connected to an infected or malicious computer or a phishing/scam web page. Supported hardware wallets Ledger wallet Particl is currently supported by Ledger Wallet and has been integrated in such a way that it supports cold staking.
